list.abs: modulus of rupture 破坏模数mohammedan blue 回回青Mohs’ hardness 莫士硬度标
mohammedan 伊斯兰教, mohammedan 伊斯兰教的, mohammedan 伊斯兰教徒

means.word_mean: 1. the religion of Muslims collectively which governs their civilization and way of life; the predominant religion of northern Africa, the Middle East, Pakistan and Indonesia
2. the monotheistic religion of Muslims founded in Arabia in the 7th century and based on the teachings of Muhammad as laid down in the Koran;

sentences.sentence: "the term Muhammadanism is offensive to Muslims who believe that Allah, not Muhammad, founded their religion"
